name: Zak McKracken goes looking for Hot Coffee (in several wrong places)
name_original: Zak McKracken goes looking for Hot Coffee (in several wrong places)
description:
A sequel to Zak McKracken and the Alien Mindbenders, and a prequel to Zak McKracken - Between Time and Space.

A classic point and click adventure game, paying homage to the Lucas Arts adventures of yore.

Remixing locations of the fan adventure game Zak McKracken - Between Time and Space, with several new locations added exclusively to this game. Tag along your favorite tabloid reporter as he stumbles into his latest adventure.

This is a one-person project, 8 years in the making.
